text: Clash by Night is a 1952 film noir drama movie. It was directed by Fritz Lang. The movie is based on the play of the same name by Clifford Odets. It stars Marilyn Monroe, Barbara Stanwyck, Robert Ryan, and Keith Andres. It was distributed by RKO Radio Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1952 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Fritz Lang Category:Movies set in California
title: Clash by Night
